DESCRIPTION: Manage your server backups in an efficient way!
MISSING_BACKUP_ID: ¡Por favor ingrese una ID de la copia de seguridad!
NO_BACKUP_FOUND: No se encontraron copias de seguridad para `{{backupID}}`
TIMES_UP: ¡Se acabó el tiempo! ¡Carga de la copia de seguridad cancelada!
SUCCESS_PUBLIC: Backup successfully created! The backup ID has been sent to you in private messages!
SUCCESS_PRIVATE: Here's your backup ID: `{{backupID}}`, use it to load your backup on an another server!
CONFIRMATION:
:warning: | **Loading a backup will replace the actual server with the saved one.**

:arrow_right_hook: *Answer by sending `confirm` to confirm this action!*
